OmniUiCard.description: Show transfer action options for ACAT
OmniUiCard.name: FSCWlthInitAutoAcctTfrSelectTransferAction
OmniUiCard.sampleDataSourceResponse: [{"Name":"Inwards Transfer","Text":"Deposits securities or cash from an external investment account into your account.","Selected":true},{"Name":"Outwards Transfer","Text":"Deposits securities or cash from your account into an external investment account.","Selected":false}]
